customAspects.title: CustomAspect
customAspects.description: A custom property which is determined by the requested entity schema - see '/schemas'

displayName.description: A friendly human readable title of the referenced domain.

href.description: The resource URL of the referenced domain.

items.description: The domains this entity is being used in.

id.description: ID must be a valid UUID string following RFC 4122.

links.title: CustomLink
links.description: Custom relations which do not affect the behavior.

displayName.description: A friendly human readable title of the referenced unit.

href.description: The resource URL of the referenced unit.

owner.description: A reference to the unit containing this entity.

validFrom.description: A timestamp acc. to RFC 3339 specifying when this version of the entity was saved.

validUntil.description: A timestamp acc. to RFC 3339 specifying the point in time when this version of the entity was superseded by a newer version or deleted. Empty if this is the current version.

version.description: The version is an integer that is automatically incremented by the server whenever the entity is saved.
